Name: AF-ZERO
About the game: AF-ZERO is a shooting em up based on 80's games. The game contains 7 stages, scenarios with multiple scroll, 3 different weapons with 3 levels of power, several enemies. The story goes after an alien virus invades the system of a military base on the moon, only the prototype AF-ZERO has not been infected, now this spacecraft along with its pilot Vania Scorpion will have to find the source of the virus and destroy it
Meta Title: AF-ZERO: Nov 28, 2017, Recompile and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on AF-ZERO? Check out the release date (Nov 28, 2017), developer insights from Recompile, and a complete game summary.
